Package no.uio.ifi.crypt4gh.stream

Class Crypt4GHInputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.InputStream
java.io.FilterInputStream
no.uio.ifi.crypt4gh.stream.Crypt4GHInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class Crypt4GHInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
Crypt4GHInputStream that wraps existing InputStream.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crypt4GHInputStream

      public Crypt4GHInputStream​(java.io.InputStream in, java.security.PrivateKey readerPrivateKey) throws java.io.IOException, java.security.GeneralSecurityException
      Constructs Crypt4GHInputStream that wraps existing InputStream.
      Parameters:
      in - Existing InputStream.
      readerPrivateKey - Recipient's private key.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the Crypt4GH header can't be read from the underlying InputStream.
      java.security.GeneralSecurityException - In case the Crypt4GH header can't be deserialized.

    • Crypt4GHInputStream

      public Crypt4GHInputStream​(java.io.InputStream in, DataEditList dataEditList, java.security.PrivateKey readerPrivateKey) throws java.io.IOException, java.security.GeneralSecurityException
      Constructs Crypt4GHInputStream that wraps existing InputStream with DataEditList.
      Parameters:
      in - Existing InputStream.
      dataEditList - DataEditList
      readerPrivateKey - Recipient's private key.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the Crypt4GH header can't be read from the underlying InputStream.
      java.security.GeneralSecurityException - In case the Crypt4GH header can't be deserialized.
